```{=html}
<!-- ===== HEADER ===== -->
<header id="header">
  <div class="header-container">
    <a href="#" class="logo-wrapper">
      <!-- SVGロゴをそのまま貼る -->
      <svg class="logo-svg" viewBox="0 0 200 60" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet">
        <defs>
          <linearGradient id="blueGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
            <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#0099CC;stop-opacity:0.6" />
            <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#00D9FF;stop-opacity:1" />
          </linearGradient>
          <linearGradient id="pinkGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
            <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FF1493;stop-opacity:1" />
            <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#FF69B4;stop-opacity:0.6" />
          </linearGradient>
          <radialGradient id="centerGlowGrad">
            <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:0.8" />
            <stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#FFA500;stop-opacity:0.4" />
            <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#FF8C00;stop-opacity:0" />
          </radialGradient>
          <filter id="glowEffect">
            <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="1.5" result="coloredBlur"/>
            <feMerge>
              <feMergeNode in="coloredBlur"/>
              <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
            </feMerge>
          </filter>
          <filter id="strongGlowEffect">
            <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2.5" result="coloredBlur"/>
            <feMerge>
              <feMergeNode in="coloredBlur"/>
              <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
            </feMerge>
          </filter>
        </defs>
        <g transform="translate(35, 30)">
          <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="25" fill="url(#centerGlowGrad)" opacity="0.3"/>
          <path d="M -28,-10 Q -18,-16 -9,-13 Q -5,-11 0,-9 Q 5,-11 9,-13 Q 18,-16 28,-10" 
                stroke="url(#blueGradient)" stroke-width="3" fill="none" 
                stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#glowEffect)"/>
          <path d="M -28,10 Q -18,16 -9,13 Q -5,11 0,9 Q 5,11 9,13 Q 18,16 28,10" 
                stroke="url(#pinkGradient)" stroke-width="3" fill="none" 
                stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#glowEffect)"/>
          <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="6" ry="14" fill="none" stroke="#FFD700" 
                   stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.3" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
          <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="3.5" fill="#FFD700" filter="url(#strongGlowEffect)"/>
          <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2.2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.95"/>
          <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="1" fill="#FFD700"/>
        </g>
        <g transform="translate(70, 30)">
          <text x="0" y="5" font-family="'Georgia', 'Times New Roman', serif" 
                font-size="16" font-weight="300" fill="#ffffff" letter-spacing="2">
            H × F
          </text>
          <text x="0" y="14" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" 
                font-size="6" fill="#999999" letter-spacing="1">
            FOCUSED FLOW
          </text>
        </g>
      </svg>
    </a>

    <nav>
      <a href="#about">ABOUT</a>
      <a href="#research">RESEARCH</a>
      <a href="#publications">PUBLICATIONS</a>
      <a href="#contact">CONTACT</a>
    </nav>
  </div>
</header>
<!-- ===== MAIN ===== -->
<main>
<section class="hero">
  <div class="hero-content">
    <h1 class="fade-in">Hirotaka Fukui</h1>
    <p class="subtitle fade-in">Kobe University, Graduate School of Economics, Ph.D. Student</p>
    <p class="tagline fade-in" style="font-size:1rem;color:#aaaaaa;">International Macroeconomics・Monetary Economics・Emerging and Developing Economies</p>
    <div class="cta-buttons fade-in">
      <a href="#research" class="btn btn-primary">VIEW RESEARCH</a>
      <a href="#contact" class="btn btn-secondary">GET IN TOUCH</a>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
</main>
<script>
  // ヘッダーのスクロール効果
  window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
    const header = document.getElementById('header');
    if (window.scrollY > 50) {
      header.classList.add('scrolled');
    } else {
      header.classList.remove('scrolled');
    }
  });
</script>
```
